https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uHqKtDv0n5QvZzN073MkZniqV1v.jpg Rookie policeman Tai Lin yearned to be an artist before he failed an examination and followed in his father's footsteps. One day he interrupts an apparent suicide attempt by a woman standing on the edge of a bridge. A Love of Blueness
